title: Understanding the Error
text: When you delete a row or column that is referenced by a formula in another cell, the formula loses its reference point. This results in an error message.

title: Identifying the Error Message
text: The error message that appears when a formula loses its reference is a specific type of error. It indicates that the reference is no longer valid.

title: What is the Error Message?
text: Enter the error message that appears when a formula references a deleted cell.
